age_at_sentencing.source: The defendant is now 23 years old and had a clear record.

gender.source: He was committed to the Court of First Instance for sentence.

household_composition.source: Defendant lived there with his parents and younger brother.

occupation.occupation_name: Elevator repair apprentice; construction worker (previously); unemployed at time of arrest
occupation.source: After finishing school, he became an elevator repair apprentice and had a full-time job, but the COVID pandemic affected his employment and he was made redundant. He did work for some time in 2022 as a construction worker. But at the time of his arrest, he was unemployed.
